Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute near Grand/Springfield
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Pulaski, Division, Hamlin, Grand and over the regular route due to, street blockage near Grand/Springfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Pulaski, Division, Hamlin, Grand and over the regular route due to, street blockage near Grand/Springfield.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Avenue O, 135th and Baltimore: due to, street blockage near Brainard/137th.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Belmont due to a delay . Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Belmont due to a delay 

Shuttle buses has been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area between Fullerton and Southport 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
